notes_text: Medical use of cannabis was legalized in November 2018. The plant itself, however, remains unavailable due to a policy implemented by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety.
notes: Medical use of cannabis was legalized in November 2018. The plant itself, however, remains unavailable due to a policy implemented by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in South Korea}} Medical use of cannabis was legalized in November 2018. The plant itself, however, remains unavailable due to a policy implemented by the [[Ministry of Food and Drug Safety]].<ref>{{cite news|url=https://www.ft.com/content/ff715088-f2ba-11e8-ae55-df4bf40f9d0d|title=South Korea legalises medical marijuana|work=[[Financial Times]]|access-date=29 November 2018|archive-url=https://archive.today/20181214110836/https://www.ft.com/content/ff715088-f2ba-11e8-ae55-df4bf40f9d0d|archive-date=14 December 2018|url-status=live|url-access=subscription}}</ref>
